item.title: Key Combiner - No need for your mouse anymore ‚ùåüñ±Ô∏è
item.description: Key Combiner - your one stop shop for learning keyboard shortcuts I recently found Key Combiner and I just need to say: "Wow, what a great tool if you want to learn keyboard shortcuts!" The goal of Key Combiner is to help you to find and also learn keyboard shortcuts. There are two "levels" you can use Key Combiner. Level 1: Using the homepage The homepage is great source of information.
